name: cpsit/typo3-upgrade-analyser
description: Standalone TYPO3 Upgrade Analysis Tool - Analyzes TYPO3 installations for upgrade readiness

scripts-descriptions.fix:composer: Fix Composer configuration format and sorting
scripts-descriptions.fix:php: Fix PHP coding style violations using PHP CS Fixer
scripts-descriptions.lint: Run all linting checks (composer, editorconfig, php, rector)
scripts-descriptions.lint:composer: Check Composer configuration format without modifying files
scripts-descriptions.lint:editorconfig: Check EditorConfig compliance without modifying files
scripts-descriptions.lint:php: Check PHP coding style without modifying files
scripts-descriptions.lint:rector: Check Rector rules without applying changes
scripts-descriptions.sbom: Create a software bill of material
scripts-descriptions.sca:php: Run PHPStan static analysis with 2GB memory limit
scripts-descriptions.test: Run unit tests only (excludes integration, real-world, API, and performance tests)
scripts-descriptions.test:all-integration: Run all integration tests including real-world and API tests (no coverage)
scripts-descriptions.test:coverage: Generate test coverage report (HTML, Clover XML, and text formats)
scripts-descriptions.test:github-api: Run GitHub API integration tests (requires network, stops on first failure)
scripts-descriptions.test:integration: Run integration tests without external API calls (no coverage)
scripts-descriptions.test:real-world: Run real-world scenario tests (requires network, stops on first failure)
scripts-descriptions.test:ter-api: Run TYPO3 Extension Repository API tests (requires network, stops on first failure)
scripts-descriptions.test:unit: Run unit tests only (fast, isolated tests)
